entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
